summary: This bill, S. 1071, mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to disinter the remains of Fernando V. Cota from Fort Sam Houston National Cemetery in Texas. The Secretary must notify the next of kin before disinterment. After disinterment, the remains will be given to the next of kin. If no kin responds, the Secretary will arrange for an appropriate disposition. The bill's aim is to deal with the remains of a deceased veteran, Fernando V. Cota.
